#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40754#issuecomment-1431675916: 
   * introduce `cond::service::PoolDBOutputService::kSharedResource`
   * use the `cond::service::PoolDBOutputService::kSharedResource` resource in `ConditionDBWriter`
   * all classes in the `ConditionDBWriter<T>` hierarchy changed to call `usesResource()` in their constructor

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.
